name: FindThem
description:
In this game you have to find all the easter eggs. The game is under development. If you find the first easter egg, let us know in the commentary. Think unnaturally and you will find them all. There is 1 easter egg in the game so far, if you find it nothing will happen, but try your best.

click W to go forward

click S to go back

click A to go left

click D to go right

click Q to slow down time

click CTRL to crouch

click R to drop all weapons

click 1,2 weapon selection

click P to reset level
